original_text: Therefore hath the Lord recompensed me according to my righteousness, according to the cleanness of my hands in his eyesight.
korean_text: 그러므로 여호와께서 내 의를 따라 갚으시되 그의 목전에서 내 손이 깨끗한 만큼 내게 갚으셨도다

sentences.original_text: Therefore hath the Lord recompensed me
according to the cleanness of my hands
